name: INSetMessageAttributeIntentHandling
desc: An interface that handles modifying message attributes.

items.name: func resolveAttribute(for: INSetMessageAttributeIntent, with: (INMessageAttributeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the attribute to apply to the messages.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSetMessageAttributeIntent, completion: (INSetMessageAttributeIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can modify the attributes.
